name: Notes from the Cape, Season 3
description:
Notes from the Cape, Season 3

Notes from the Cape is a visual novella series about the citizens of Cape Bottom Sail, a beach town and tourist destination on a peaceful, idyllic version of Earth. Episodes vary from slice of life, to cute and horny, to sincere and sweet. Expect some adult situations, nudity, and sex. This is an adults only series.

This package contains the final episodes, 26-30, of the Notes from the Cape series.  It also contains image packs for every episode.

Created & Illustrated by Artdecade
Written by Gerrark & Artdecade
Coding by Super Deluxe Joe & Artdecade

Many thanks to all those that supported the series as it was being produced, and to those that have purchased it since then. From everyone at the cape, thank you so much. What's gone is gone, see you tomorrow!
